text: Nicolai Mincev (born 20 October 1972) is a retired Moldovan football defender.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Moldovan footballers Category:CS Tiligul-Tiras Tiraspol players Category:FC Tiraspol players Category:FC Nistru Otaci players Category:FC Spartak Semey players Category:FC Dacia Chișinău players Category:FC Nasaf players Category:FC Iskra-Stal players Category:FC Zaria Bălți players Category:Association football defenders Category:Moldovan expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Kazakhstan Category:Moldovan expatriate sportspeople in Kazakhstan Category:Expatriate footballers in Uzbekistan Category:Moldovan expatriate sportspeople in Uzbekistan
title: Nicolai Mincev
